definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130

sentences.english: I only know two sorts of boys. Mealy boys, and beef-faced boys.
sentences.chinese: 我只知道兩種男孩，臉色蒼白和滿臉都是橫肉的。
